ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and very thinly sliced
freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 cups freshly shredded Gruyere cheese, divided

cookingTips: Slice potatoes as thin as possible for even cooking and creamy texture
Layer potatoes with cheese and seasoning, reserving cheese for top layer for golden finish
Cover with foil during baking and remove during last 10 minutes to achieve crispy top
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook master the art of layering and understand how thin slicing and proper oven technique create a dish with creamy interior and golden crust.
